content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This logon name was earlier used in Active Directory. It has format DOMAIN\\\\FirstName_LastName and has length restriction: 20 symbols. Password: user's domain password.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Domain depends on user's location.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": pre-Windows 2000 logon name of user John Dow from London would be BUDAPEST\\\\John_Dow.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case user's name in the form FistName_LastName is longer than 20 symbols, exceeding symbols should be simply removed at the end.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": for the user Emiliya Nevmerzhytska (21 symbol) from Lviv Pre-Windows 2000 logon name would be KYIV\\\\Emiliya_Nevmerzhytsk (without a: 20 symbols).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The best way to check user's pre-Windows 2000 logon name is to view it on Account tab in Active Directory, (see task:Â \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"REVIEWING USER'S DOMAIN ACCOUNT: ACTIVE DIRECTORY PROPERTIES: ACCOUNT TAB\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
